args.natural_language_statement: Let ||¬∑|| be any norm on R^n. Show that the induced operator norm on L(R^n, R^m) satisfies ||A|| = max { ||Ax|| : ||x|| = 1 } = sup { ||Ax|| : ||x|| ‚â§ 1 } = sup { ||Ax|| : ||x|| < 1 }. Use that the unit sphere is compact in finite dimensions.

retrieved_examples.nl: For a linear map between finite dimensional normed spaces, the operator norm equals the supremum over the unit ball.
retrieved_examples.lean:
import Mathlib

variable {E F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù F] [FiniteDimensional ‚Ñù E]

theorem operator_norm_on_unit_ball (f : E ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] F) : ‚Äñf‚Äñ = Sup (fun x => ‚Äñf x‚Äñ) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

variables {E F : Type*} [SeminormedAddCommGroup E] [SeminormedAddCommGroup F]
  [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù F] [FiniteDimensional ‚Ñù E] [FiniteDimensional ‚Ñù F]

/-- For a bounded linear map between finite-dimensional real normed spaces, the operator norm
    equals the maximum of ‚Äñf x‚Äñ on the unit sphere, and hence equals the suprema over the
    closed and open unit balls. -/
theorem operator_norm_eq_on_unit_sets (f : E ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] F) :
  ‚Äñf‚Äñ = Sup ((fun x => ‚Äñf x‚Äñ) '' sphere (0 : E) 1) ‚àß
  ‚Äñf‚Äñ = Sup ((fun x => ‚Äñf x‚Äñ) '' closedBall (0 : E) 1) ‚àß
  ‚Äñf‚Äñ = Sup ((fun x => ‚Äñf x‚Äñ) '' ball (0 : E) 1) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

variable {E F : Type*}
  [SeminormedAddCommGroup E] [SeminormedAddCommGroup F]
  [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù F] [FiniteDimensional ‚Ñù E]

/-- For a bounded linear map on a finite-dimensional real normed space E,
    there exists a unit vector attaining the operator norm; consequently this
    operator norm is the maximum over the unit sphere and bounds the values
    on the closed and open unit balls. -/
theorem operator_norm_eq_on_unit_sets (f : E ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] F) :
  ‚àÉ x : E,
    ‚Äñx‚Äñ = 1 ‚àß
    ‚Äñf x‚Äñ = ‚Äñf‚Äñ ‚àß
    (‚àÄ y, ‚Äñy‚Äñ = 1 ‚Üí ‚Äñf y‚Äñ ‚â§ ‚Äñf x‚Äñ) ‚àß
    (‚àÄ y, ‚Äñy‚Äñ ‚â§ 1 ‚Üí ‚Äñf y‚Äñ ‚â§ ‚Äñf x‚Äñ) ‚àß
    (‚àÄ y, ‚Äñy‚Äñ < 1 ‚Üí ‚Äñf y‚Äñ ‚â§ ‚Äñf x‚Äñ) := by sorry
